job.title: Sr. Software Engineer
job.description: Parker + Lynch is assisting our client to hire a new Sr. Software Engineer to their permanent, growing team. The ideal candidate is a self-motivated, multi-tasker, and demonstrated team-player. You will be a Senior developer responsible for the development of new software products and enhancements to existing products, as well as mentorship of more junior developers on the team.
